package.name: wisdm
package.description: Workbench for Integrated Species Distribution Modeling

onlineLibrary.name: wisdm-example
onlineLibrary.description: Example library for modeling Brewer's Sparrow distribution in the Wyoming Basins, USA

onlineLibrary.name: wisdm-maxent-example
onlineLibrary.description: Example library for modeling Brewer's and Vesper's Sparrow distributions in the Wyoming Basins, USA
